entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
